name: Brunch
description: A delightful brunch menu featuring both sweet and savory options, available Saturday and Sunday from 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM.

items.name: Seasonal Strata
items.description: Savory layered egg bake with seasonal vegetables, cheese, and crispy potato crust

items.name: French Omelette
items.description: Classic French omelette with choice of fillings including ham, bacon, sausage, cheddar, Swiss, mushrooms, onions, and peppers, served with home-fries and toasted sourdough bread

items.name: Signature Egg Bake Casserole
items.description: Fluffy baked eggs with roasted peppers, spinach, and cheddar

items.name: Quiche Selection
items.description: A choice from a variety of quiches including Lorraine (bacon and Swiss), Spinach & Feta, and Wild Mushroom, served with a fresh greens salad

items.name: Gourmet Breakfast Sandwich
items.description: With eggs, cheese, and choice of bacon, sausage, or avocado on a toasted brioche bun

items.name: Breakfast Bowl
items.description: Scrambled eggs with choice of veggies, meats, and cheeses over crispy golden potatoes with herbs and caramelized onions. Optional sauces include hollandaise, salsa, and pesto

items.name: Yogurt Parfait Cups
items.description: Layered Greek yogurt with honey, granola, and fresh seasonal berries

items.name: Fresh Fruit Cups
items.description: Seasonal fruit medley, perfectly portioned for individual service

items.name: Assorted Muffins & Sweet Breads
items.description: Chef's selection of house-baked muffins and sweet loaves

items.name: House Jams & Spreads
items.description: A variety of artisanal jams, compound butters, and preserves, served with toasted bread

name: Desserts
description: Indulge in our decadent selection of house-made desserts.

items.name: Best Chocolate Chip Cookie
items.description: Valrhona chocolate and vanilla butter

items.name: Brownie with Tahini Swirls
items.description: Rich chocolate brownie with Halava bits and a swirl of tahini

items.name: Blondie
items.description: Chewy blondie with toasted pecans and a hint of sea salt

items.name: Oatmeal Raisin
items.description: Classic oatmeal raisin cookie with plump Black and Golden Raisins

items.name: Carrot Chamomile Layer Cake
items.description: Spiced carrot cake infused with chamomile, honey cream cheese frosting, and walnut praline

items.name: Sour Cream Pound Cake
items.description: Classic sour cream pound cake with lemon curd and lemon glaze

items.name: Tiramisu Crepe Cake
items.description: Delicate layers of coffee and cocoa crepes with mascarpone cream

items.name: Fruit and Lemon Galette
items.description: Seasonal fruit medley baked in a flaky crust with vanilla custard and lemon glaze

items.name: Seasonal Fruit Pavlova
items.description: Crisp meringue topped with seasonal fruit and vanilla custard

items.name: Strawberry and Cream Bambolone
items.description: Fluffy Italian doughnut filled with strawberry compote and vanilla bean pastry cream

description: A curated selection of beverages to complement your meal.

items.name: Seasonal Craft Cocktails
items.description: Ask about our rotating selection of handcrafted seasonal cocktails

items.description: Carefully selected wines by the bottle and by the glass to complement our menu. Please ask your server for our current list.
